column5:
Remove mention of Empties

We are no longer maintaining Empties.

Add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

GitHub has a new feature that indicates if a project has a code of
conduct. We already had one, linked from `CONTRIBUTING.md`. This commit
just duplicates that link in a place where GitHub can find it.

Revert "Update middleman-sprockets to 4.1"

This reverts commit 5742c5a64080cb60aa4983e7dd942812e3c5bcdc.

Update Ruby to 2.3.3

This should fix our Middleman build errors.

See: http://www.guilded.co/fixing-ruby-crash-on-middleman-using-ruby-230.html
Add notice that components are outdated
Fix overflow parameter for dropdown component
Remove fake logos, replace with placeholders
Add generic background image to hero and make layout more versatile
Fix JS error that happens when more menu is not used in nav

Remove Bourbon's mixins
- Add Autoprefixer
- Add note regarding no vendor prefixes
- Format color functions
Fix broken sliding menu on Component and Type page
Make sub-submenu of nav and center nav responsive

Specify wrapper max width

- Neat was updated, which changed the default max-width for outer-contaienr.
- This commit adds a variable to set this width to what it always was

Remove use of Bourbon's linear-gradient mixin

- CSS gradients have strong support without prefixes: http://caniuse.com/#feat=css-gradients
- This Bourbon mixin is also removed in v5.0
Use double colons for pseudo elements
Use zero convention instead of none for borders
Clean up usage of Bourbon's position mixin
Remove usage of transition and transform Bourbon mixins
Point Hound to local SCSS-Lint config

Update Middleman to v4

- Update Middleman from v3 to v4
- Use sassc
- Move SnippetHelpers into a helpers/ directory, which Middleman automatically
  loads: https://middlemanapp.com/basics/helper_methods/#custom-defined-helpers
- Rename all.scss to all.css.scss because Middleman 4 appears to require this
- Pull , generator_spec gem from RubyGems instead of GitHub
- Declare Ruby version in the Gemfile

Update and lock down gems

- Update bourbon to 4.2
- Lock middleman to 3.x
- Lock middleman-livereload to 3.x
- Lock middleman-gh-pages to 0.x
- Format Gemfile
Switch flashes to use Sass maps
Switch badges to use Sass maps
Make it possible to use multiple expanders
Remove unstyled and add a link to Empties

Make tabs Hound-compliant

It was a poor experience to add tabs to a project and then
have Hound provide lots of style feedback.

https://github.com/thoughtbot/hub/pull/411

This pull request attempts to address all that feedback.
Update hero styles to be consistent with empties hero

Recommend installing in the development group

Refills is not needed at runtime. The gem is used as a generator when
developing. Loading it in production contributes to memory use, which
can become a problem multiplied across several processes in low-memory
environments such as Heroku.

Fix `.more` dissapearing on chrome >= 46

At the time of writing chrome>=46 broke navigation positioning when
using the `.more` class making the parent container position relative
fixes this issue
Fix for missing tab-link class causing broken links in accordion content
Cards: Images go semitransparent on hover, to let background color shine through

dropdowns should only toggle one at a time

This fix will prevent all dropdowns from opening at the same time
in the event that more than one is put on a page by binding the
toggle to the element that is clicked not a page-wide jquery selector.
Add code of conduct to contributing guide
Avoid protocol definition while including fonts
Just say 'All' if all checkboxes are checked
change http to https for type systems

fixes modal window closing bug

Closes #239

Allow closing modals by clicking on background window

Closes #236
Ensure that we disable scrolling once the modal is open

Add segment tracking

* Remove Google Analytics, segment will send that same data over

Update accordion_tabs_minimal.js

added terminating semicolon to line 9

Add tests for animate

- Generate corresponding CoffeeScript

Upgrade to the new travis containers

See: http://docs.travis-ci.com/user/workers/container-based-infrastructure/

Refactor copy-code-snippets

- Simplify the finding what code to copy by traversing up the table, and
  then moving downwards to the `pre` block.

Allow copying JS aswell as CoffeeScript

- Add another copy-button to the JS section that copies the hidden
  coffeescript pre-block's code.
- Refactor `SnippetHelpers#render_snippet` to take a snippet

Exclude coffeescript from being loaded

`require_tree` requires everything recursively under the given path,
and we want to ignore `refills/coffeescript` entirely.
So we pair `require_directory` which does not share that behaviour, with
requiring the files we need form the `.`.
Explain how to work with coffeescript for a contributor

Copy coffee files when passing `--coffee`

I made the spec passing before having someone else signing of the idea

Generate coffeescript files from the javascript

Generated by running:

	$ rake coffee

Add task to generate all js -> coffee

Run it with `rake coffee`

Add setup script

- installs gems
- installs js2coffee
Explain how to work with the building process
Explicitly use the latest release of `generator_spec`

Fetch `generator_spec` from github

When installing `generator_spec` via rubygems, it downloads another
version of the gem instead of the latest and greatest. For some oddball
reason

Remove NEWS.md

- Use GitHub Releases instead: https://github.com/thoughtbot/refills/releases

Update sliding_menu.js

Missing event in slide menu javascript

Restructure project assets

- Break out vendor stylesheet and javascript assets
- Update to Normalize.css 3.0.2
- Fixes #106
Use Bourbon and Neat gems instead of local copies
Fix Sass code style for flashes
Update maps javascript to use module pattern
Refine README to align with the rest of the Boubon suite
Remove Sass Maps from flashes and label-alerts
License is in a markdown file, not a text file.

Add updated Syntax for Analytics

As of Jan 2013 Google updated the analytics code.
http://analytics.blogspot.com/2013/10/an-easy-way-to-upgrade-to-universal_23.html
Allow dropdown to act as a normal dropdown

User contribution
- fetch grid item color list with 'length'
- replace anchor stubs with js:void(0) to avoid 'navigation'
- remove repetetive background-size
- space consistent with style guide
- background-size
- replace href stubs with javascript:void(0) and fix typo
- remove autosaves
Add flashes and label styles from bitters

Remove the unneeded "push" div for sticky footer

Rather than use an extra div, use the :after pseudo-element on the
.wrapper-for-content-outside-of-footer div.
Alphabetize components, patterns and type systems

Add `spec` coverage for `Refills::ImportGenerator`

* Adds test coverage for generating previously defined snippets. Provides a hook
  to test future snippet generation.
* Includes `middleman-gh-pages` in `Gemfile`
* Add Travis support
  * declare `rspec` rake task
  * setup `.travis.yml`

Firefox compatibility

With this, Firefox stops complaining about "event" not being defined, in the console.

Update _switch.scss

Box-shadow mixin is deprecated.  Replace with css box-shadow.
Updates to the readme and license
Styling for code blocks in type systems and added link to Bitters
Use Rails naming conventions for partials

Expands snippets across screen, JS in separate column.

*Separate javascript from html
*combine snippet rendering as single method call
*refactor snippet iteration
*pass snippets into code partial directly
*make constants private
*reorder languages
*remove old snippets partial
*fix indentation in vertical tabs js
*fix three or two columns for snippets
*expand all snippets to full screen width
Ignore the pkg directory from cutting a new release
Require missing rails generators in list generator

Change closing h2 tag to p tag on comment detail

This commit changes the closing h2 tag to a closing p tag on the comment
detail section of the comment source.

Update all.scss

Remove one of the Normalize imports so it's not brought in twice.
Left align breadcrumbs and add spacing
Button group reflows on small screens

Add native scrolling on iPhone for sliding menu

This also adds it for the nav on the refills demo page
Center copy in dynamic height image gradients

Fix width of fixed height image gradient

Before it was wider than the rest of the page on the iPhone.
Render all snippets using the same partial

Refactor vertical tabs

* js class names
* more descriptive class names
* smaller css chunks
* localize media queries

Image Cards CSS

* Remove line clamp
* Auto height
* CSS readability

Cards CSS

* Remove line clamp
* Auto height
* Improve readability

Refactor sliding menu

* Cover body content with a screen
* Clicking screen closes menu
* Local js targets
Add right box shadow to code pre

Set up left sidebar menu

* Set up layout file with markup base
* Add links to navigation menu left sidebar
* Make sidebar layout responsive
* Add smooth scroll functionality to menu markup

Import and list available Refills

Implemented as rails generators

Toggle the source for a refill

Clicking on the link displays the source below.

Refactor accordion

* Decouple html and js
* Block level anchor
Rename Dropdown-Menu to Accordion. Add Dropdown menu
Fix search bar in iOS mobile

Optimize Modal

* Fix small stylesheet typo to improve padding cross-browsers
* Disable body overflow scrolling when modal is open
* Remove extra linespaces
* Fix indentation on Accordion

https://trello.com/c/kbjNLUky
